  • Class
    Description
    BusEvent
    SimulationEvent that represents a bus operation completed by any SimulationComponent component.
    CycleEvent
    SimulationEvent that represents a simulation cycle.
    DecodeEvent
    SimulationEvent that represents a decode operation completed by a Processor component.
    FetchEvent
    SimulationEvent that represents a fetch operation completed by a Processor component.
    FrameEvent
    SimulationEvent that signals a VideoDevice has finished rendering to frame buffer
    MemoryEvent
    SimulationEvent that signals a memory operation on a MemorySpace component.
    SimulationEvent
    Represents an event raised by a SimulationComponent object.
    SimulationListener
    Interface for listeners of SimulationEvent events.
